Text: Could you watch the video? (You didn't receive an error message)
Assess the physical attractiveness of the person in the video.
Assess the expressiveness of the person, whether he or she is energetic, intense, has an active body gesture.
Assess if you think that the person is comfortable in front of the camera.
Assess the person's voice attractiveness of the person in the video.
Assess the kindness of the person, understanding kindness as a person that care about others, gentle, friendly and generous.
Assess whether the person is eloquent and articulate -- whether he or she expresses her/his opinion or feelings well.
What emotion do you think he/she is expressing?
Do you trust in the transmitted emotion? Does it seems credible, authentic?
Would you trust this person after seeing this video?
What would make you trust or distrust this person?
Options: [Physical Appariency,Voice,Expressiveness,Comfort in front of the camera,Kindness,Eloquence,Emotion,Other]
